1: What is your physical built like (Your Body-Frame) ?
2: How do you walk and talk ?
3: Your reaction to weather conditions(what do you like) ?
5: What is your APPETITE or hunger like ?
7: How is the texture of your hair ?
8: How are your Lips and Teeth ?
10: Some general sign of your body ?
11: What kind of memory do you have ?
13: How good your mind is in taking actions ?
14: How is the quality of your sleep ?

1.a): Thin,bony and small framed.Hardly gain weight.
1.b): Medium-built. Can gain or lose weight easily.
1.c): Large built.Gain weight easily but difficult to lose.

3.a): Enjoy warm climate but feel uncomfortable in cool weather.
3.b): Enjoy cool weather and dislike warm climate.
3.c): Comfortable for most of the year but prefer summer and spring. Don't like damp climate.

4.a): Sweat little but not much. Have minimum body odour.
4.b): Sweat a lot. Have medium body odour.
4.c): Sweat moderately but sweat a lot while working hard. Have strong body odour.

5.a): Irregular,Sometimes I feel hungry sometimes I don't.
5.b): Strong and sharp. Always feel hungry.
5.c): Decent appetite. Have tendency to eat for comfort and taste.

6.a): Normal to dry, rough, thin and cool. Skin issues like dryness, dullness and wrinkly.
6.b): Normal to oily, soft, reddish, sensitive and warm. Skin issues like inflammation.
6.c): Normal to oily, soft, thick and cool. Skin issues like excessive oily, itching, fungal infections.

7.a): Rough, dry and wavy. I get split ends easily.
7.c): Thick, curly and oily. Hair colour tends to be an darker side.

8.a): Thin lips that tend to get dry. Teeth can be somewhat uneven and require constant attention.
8.b): Medium sized soft lips. Upper lip slightly darker than lower lip. Teeth are medium sized but I tend to suffer from cavities.
8.c): Large and smooth lips. Teeth are well formed and aligned and require less care in general.

9.a): Small in size. Feel dry and sleepy eyes often.
9.b): Medium in size. I often get reddish eyes.
9.c): Big and attractive. I have thick eyelashes.

10.a): Cracking sound in joints. Small forehead. Nails cracks easily.
10.b): Black moles on body. Medium forehead. Nails are pink and soft.
10.c): Disproportionate body like heavy thighs, hips etc. Large forehead. Nails are wide and whitish.

11.a): Quick to learn but quick to forgot. Short term memory is good.
11.b): Average speed of learning, But once learnt never forgets.
11.c): Slow to learn but remembers for a long time. Long term memory is good.

12.a): Mind tends to get restless easily.
12.b): Mind gets impatient or aggresive easily.
12.c): Mind remains cool and calm. Mostly, unruffels.

13.c): Lazy Implementation. Has a tendency to procastinate.

14.a): Light and disturbed sleep. I wake up easily in the morning.
14.b): Moderate but regular. I can go back to sleep easily.
14.c): Deep and heavy. I can't easily wake up in morning.

15.a): I worry a lot. Often feel nervous and anxious.
15.b): I often get irritable,angry and impatient.
15.c): Loving and caring. It takes a lot to make me angry.
